sen.j: 望月城（もちづきじょう）は、滋賀県甲賀市にあった日本の城。
sen.e: Mochizuki-jo Castle was a Japanese castle once situated in Koga City, Shiga Prefecture.
Mochizuki-jo Castle was a Japanese castle which was situated in Koga City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 望月城は、戦国時代、近江国の甲賀郡の忍者一族・望月氏の山城だった。
sen.e: Mochizuki-jo Castle was a mountain castle once owned by the Mochizuki clan, a ninja tribe in Koga-gun, Omi Province in the Sengoku period (period of warring states).
Mochizuki-jo Castle was a mountain castle once owned by the Mochizuki clan, a ninja tribe in Koga County, Omi Province during the Sengoku period (period of warring states).

sen.j: 東へ張り出した尾根の先端に築かれており、谷を挟んだ南側の尾根には望月支城、南東には杉谷砦、北方には杉谷城がある。
sen.e: Built at the mountain ridge overhanging eastward, the castle was surrounded by its branch castle at the southern mountain ridge across a valley, Sugitani-toride Fort in the southeast, and Sugitani-jo Castle in the north.

sen.j: 築城は不明だが、概ね室町時代とされている。
sen.e: Although the actual year is unclear, the castle was generally said to be built in the Muromachi Period.
Although the actual year of completion is not known, the castle is generally believed to have been built in the Muromachi Period.

sen.j: 六角氏が織田信長による攻撃を受け、甲賀望月氏を頼り逃げ込んだとされる。
sen.e: It is said that the Rokkaku clan, being attacked by Nobunaga ODA, fled into the castle counting on the Koga Mochizuki clan for help.
sen.cmt: 「甲賀望月氏」登録用語では「Koga Mochiduki clan」とされていますが、「望月」を含む他の用語はおおむね「Mochizuki 」と登録されているため、ここでもこの表記に合わせました。
sen.e: It is said that when the Rokkaku clan was attacked by Nobunaga ODA, they apparently fled into the castle asking for help from the Koga Mochizuki clan.

sen.j: その後も織田信長の攻撃は止まず、天正2年(1574年)に落城したとされている。
sen.e: Oda would not cease his attack even afterwards, however, conquering the castle in 1574.
